016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks;
017
018import java.io.Serializable;
019import java.util.Arrays;
020
021import javax.el.ELContext;
022import javax.el.MethodExpression;
023import javax.el.MethodInfo;
024
025import lombok.EqualsAndHashCode;
026import lombok.Getter;
027import lombok.Setter;
028import lombok.ToString;
029
030/**
031 * @author Oliver Wolff
032 */
033@EqualsAndHashCode(callSuper = false)
034@ToString
035public class CuiMockMethodExpression extends MethodExpression {
036
037    private static final long serialVersionUID = 2692860324272056192L;
038
039    /** Indicates whether method was invoked. */
040    @Getter
041    @Setter
042    private boolean invoked = false;
043
044    /** Parameters method was invoked with. */
045    @Getter
046    private transient Object[] invokedParams;
047
048    /** Result to be returned on {@link #invoke(ELContext, Object[])} */
049    @Setter
050    private Serializable invokeResult;
051
052    @Setter
053    private transient MethodInfo methodInfo;
054
055    @Getter
056    @Setter
057    private String expressionString;
058
059    @Getter
060    @Setter
061    private boolean literalText = false;
062
063    @Override
064    public MethodInfo getMethodInfo(final ELContext context) {
065        return methodInfo;
066    }
067
068    @Override
069    public Object invoke(final ELContext context, final Object[] params) {
070        invoked = true;
071        invokedParams = Arrays.copyOf(params, params.length);
072        return invokeResult;
073    }
074}
